glsa.title: Dillo: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Dillo is vulnerable to a format string bug, which may result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Dillo is a small and fast multi-platform web browser based on GTK+.

description.p: Gentoo Linux developer Tavis Ormandy found a format string bug in Dillo's handling of messages in a_Interface_msg().

impact.p: An attacker could craft a malicious web page which, when accessed using Dillo, would trigger the format string vulnerability and potentially execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running Dillo.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Dillo users should upgrade to the latest version:
